definitions.definition: a compact knoblike growth on a plant that develops into a leaf, flower, or shoot.
examples: sprout, shoot, blossom; plumule fresh buds

definitions.definition: an outgrowth from an organism (e.g., a yeast cell) that separates to form a new individual without sexual reproduction taking place.
(of an animal) a rudimentary leg or other appendage that has not yet grown, or never will grow, to full size.
(of a plant or animal) form a bud.
examples: new blood vessels bud out from the vascular bed

definitions.definition: graft a bud of (a plant) onto another plant.
